full_summary:
# [Procurement Notice for Beavertail Trailer](#procurement-notice-beavertail-trailer)
## [English](#english)  [Français](#francais) 

---

### Notice Details

* Title: Beavertail Trailer
* Reference Number: cb-295-91633766 
* Solicitation Number: W8476-246784/A 
* Publication Date: 2024-02-23
* Tender Closing Date:** **2024-03-28T14:00:00**

### Procurement Information

* Type of Contract: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive bidding
* Category of Procurement: Goods and Services (GD)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: None

### Description of Goods and Services

* Quantity: One (1) Beavertail Trailer
* Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base, Joint Task Force North (Yellowknife)
* Delivery Date: Within 180 days of contract award

### Documents

* Related documents can be found on [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) under the following links:
	+ [English Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/en-rfp-w8476-246784-a-original.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/en-rfp-w8476-246784-a-amendment-002.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/en-rfp-w8476-246784-a-amendment-001.pdf)
	+ [French Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/fr-ddp-w8476-246784-a-original.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/fr-ddp-w8476-246784-a-amendment-001.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32664/fr-ddp-w8476-246784-a-amendment-002.pdf)

### Electronic submission

* Tender responses must be submitted by email to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca only.
